spells.name: Bull's Strength
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Delay Poison
spells.description: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Eagle's Splendor
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Owl's Wisdom
spells.description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

spells.name: Remove Paralysis
spells.description: Frees one or more creatures from paralysis or slow effect.

spells.name: Resist Energy
spells.description: Ignores 10 or more points of damage per attack from specified energy type.

spells.name: Shield Other
spells.description: You take half of subject's damage.

spells.name: Undetectable Alignment
spells.description: Conceals alignment from magical detection for 24 hours.
